mapper.sql: id, member_id, user_id, type, day, total_money, paid_money, unpaid_money, status, remark, deleted, creat_time, update_time
mapper.select: select sum(io.paid_money) totalIncome, sum(io.unpaid_money) totalExpenditure, sum(eo.total_money) totalUnpaidMoney from income_order io left join expenditure_order eo on 1=1 where io.deleted = 0 and io.day between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and eo.deleted = 0 and eo.day between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
